item.title: DevilScape v1 (MY FIRST SOURCE)
item.dc:creator: @mysticscape2 mysticscape2
item.description:
@mysticscape2 wrote:

DiNk, first off, you’re no better than a 2 year old with how you’re arguing with an 11 year old over a server coding deal. If you can’t even make a server of your own, then shut your mouth, stop flaming, and go suck your thumb and curl up in a ball in the corner. You’re pathetic… If this is all you know how to do, then thank the Blessed Gods that you can’t code servers. I’d be afraid to even try to fix a stupid server you may come out with. That, of course, would probably be impossible to fix anyways.

As for this source code, yes there are many similarities to others, but it is unique in its basic coding. This is 80 % home made… the other 20 % comes from tutorials. I researched it all over the internet. Devil, nice work for your first source. Not too bad at all, although it is a bit buggy. But hey, when you get that V3 out, lemme know! I’d love to see how much you’ve improved since this code. And for DiNk, why don’t you go find your pacifier and lay down in your crib like the baby you are. Just because you can’t code worth a lick doesn’t give you the right to bash others on their work. And neither does that “Senior Member” tag under your name. Go get a life, and just stay out of server programming… It’s clearly not your thing.

Best of luck to you Devil!

Read full topic

item.title: DevilScape v1 (MY FIRST SOURCE)
item.dc:creator: @DiNk DiNk
item.description:
@DiNk wrote:

[quote=“benscape, post:28, topic:243912”]Im sorry to be a drag and everything but that training area i have seen in countless ammount of servers. :[/quote]It has been in countless amount of servers maybe because you didn’t ‘count’ them?
Or maybe you just can’t count. Yes aswell it has been in very much servers, in the download section I like viewing server posts, I see very much pictures of the same training area over and over again. I even sometimes see the owners saying they created it, multiple times. I’ve seen very much of this training spot tbh, and the bank re-inforcement armour. Which had both been created by Moo Dragon. Have a look for your self in the tutorial section for his posts. Also in the download section one of his servers has both of these, also in the download section look for servers with owners saying they created the training area. Pretty funny…

This server just fails because it has no new features, a new minigame would be good, new shop items, new areas, create quests that actually work. Servers what you can only kill monsters get money buy stuff from a shop kill people in the wildy die repeat, seriously a 10 minute procedure and you’re ontop of the server, richer then admins. A server with a real good economy would be great. Try to make a server with my suggestions, you don’t have to but try.

[ul][li]Hard but easy ways to make money.[/li]
[li]Basic wilderness, player-killing and victory rewards.[/li]
[li]Quests that guide you through, as there are no DevilHQ sites.(If you have quests with no guide people will not bother to do it)[/li]
[li]Basic NPC training, object training causes lag and it has been proven several times.[/li]
[li]Sort out the skills a bit, like Woodcutting actually gets you wood, and Runecrafting actually gets you runes.[/li]
[li]Take out spawn commands.[/li]
[li]Use the whole map of the origional RuneScape, just having 1 part is no fun, nothing to do.[/li]
[li]Fix the duping glitch in trade.[/li][/ul]

Read full topic

item.title: DevilScape v1 (MY FIRST SOURCE)
item.dc:creator: @DiNk DiNk
item.description:
@DiNk wrote:

I don’t really care if it’s your first server, it doesn’t mean I should be nicer.

This looks like a peice of junk to me, really buggy.
Hardly anything to do except make money to buy stuff. But what happens when you get all the money and buy everything, what is there to do? Nothing. That is really why I think it’s crap.
The skills area, my god, I’ve seen that in 50 servers literally already! So no not ‘NEW SKILLS’
Credits to Moo Dragon.

The Edgeville bank code, adding a few re-inforcement codes, there was a tutorial on that I guess around 4 months ago, so give credits for that to Moo Dragon.
Same old training place, same old vengeance, same old barrows, same old GS Mini, YAWN

Read full topic
